label: 小野篁
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (802-852). Waka (6) in Kokinshu. Kanshi in Keikokushu (2), Fusoshu (4), Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集(11), and Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (3). [和歌、古今集、漢詩、経国集、扶桑集]
